banner.title: First interactive fitness in Azerbaijan
banner.subtitle: Luxury Wellness Destination
banner.description: Pioneering the future of premium fitness and wellness in Baku with unprecedented luxury, cultural sensitivity, and world-class amenities. Setting new standards that honor both international excellence and local values.

premiumExperiences.title: PREMIUM
premiumExperiences.subtitle: Discover our world-class facilities and services designed to elevate your wellness journey. Each space is crafted with luxury, cultural sensitivity, and your complete satisfaction in mind.

fitnessZone.title: Fitness Zone
fitnessZone.subtitle: Premium Training
fitnessZone.description: State-of-the-art fitness equipment and personalized training programs designed to maximize your workout efficiency and results.

spaZone.title: Spa Zone
spaZone.subtitle: Luxury Relaxation
spaZone.description: Indulge in world-class spa treatments and therapeutic services designed to rejuvenate your body, mind, and spirit.

beautyZone.title: Beauty Zone
beautyZone.subtitle: Aesthetic Excellence
beautyZone.description: Professional beauty services and aesthetic treatments to enhance your natural beauty with the latest techniques and premium products.

womensZone.title: Women's Zone
womensZone.subtitle: Private Sanctuary
womensZone.description: A culturally sensitive, private area exclusively for women, featuring dedicated fitness equipment, spa services, and relaxation spaces.

fitbarRestaurant.title: Fitbar Restaurant
fitbarRestaurant.subtitle: Nutrition Excellence
fitbarRestaurant.description: Gourmet healthy dining experience featuring nutritionist-designed menus, fresh ingredients, and premium beverages for optimal wellness.

retailZone.title: Retail Zone
retailZone.subtitle: Lifestyle Shopping
retailZone.description: Curated selection of premium wellness products, supplements, athletic wear, and luxury lifestyle items for the complete wellness experience.

membership.title: MEMBERSHIP
membership.subtitle: Choose your path to luxury wellness. Each membership is crafted to deliver exceptional value and exclusive experiences in Azerbaijan's premier destination.
membership.foundingMembers: Founding Members: Up to 33% OFF First 6 Months

customPlan.title: Or Build Your Custom Plan
customPlan.subtitle: Create a personalized membership by selecting only the features you need. Perfect for those who want complete control over their wellness experience.

contact.title: GET IN
contact.subtitle: Ready to begin your luxury wellness journey? Contact us today and discover what makes Crown Wellness Club Azerbaijan's premier destination.
contact.privacyNotice: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy. We respect your privacy and will never share your information with third parties.
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
contact.copyright: © 2024 Crown Wellness Club. Luxury wellness redefined in Azerbaijan.

hero.title: CROWN
hero.subtitle: Setting new standards in luxury fitness and wellness experiences across Azerbaijan

story.title: Our
story.content: Crown Wellness Club was born from a vision to bring world-class wellness experiences to Azerbaijan while honoring our rich cultural heritage. We believe that true wellness encompasses not just physical fitness, but mental clarity, cultural respect, and community connection.

worldClass.title: World-Class Facilities
worldClass.description: State-of-the-art equipment and luxurious amenities designed for the ultimate wellness experience

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: International certified professionals dedicated to your personal wellness journey and goals

culturalSensitivity.title: Cultural Sensitivity
culturalSensitivity.description: Respecting local traditions while providing modern wellness solutions for all community members

holisticApproach.title: Holistic Approach
holisticApproach.description: Comprehensive wellness programs addressing physical, mental, and spiritual well-being

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do, from our facilities to our service delivery

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: Honoring cultural values and individual preferences while creating an inclusive wellness environment

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing cutting-edge wellness technologies and methodologies to enhance your experience

community.title: Community
